name: Skyward Spine
title: Carving Black Wings: Skyward Spine
desc: A spear that can hold up the skies. It was this unshakable resolve that sustained the wind dragon through its mortal battle against its vile nemesis.
in_play_description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
Once per Round: This character's Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG.

skills.desc:
The character deals +1 DMG.
